name: Archery: Mummy Hunt Adventure
description:
Archery Mummy Hunting Game is fun and extremely simple game featuring archery sport. The game presents the player with 20 different unique levels where the player has to hit the target. And the Target is a Mummy.

The game offers player to buy and use 6 different archery equipment which have different power and hit ratio.
The player has to knock out all the mummies to win before the timer runs out.

each level has 60 seconds limit. you have to hit all targets before that. There are total of 20 level to play. more level are on the way.

The game features beautiful graphics and realistic physics gameplay. The offers player multiple situations to enjoy.




Credits :

Music : Jazz Comedy by www.bensound.com
